Curated Wellness Journeys

Discover our signature packages, designed for profound healing and rejuvenation.

Choose Your Path to Wellness

Each package is a holistic journey towards balance and health.

Rejuvenation Package

A 7-day program to revitalize your body and mind, boosting vitality and slowing the aging process.

Detox & Weight Loss

A 14-day intensive program focused on deep cleansing and healthy weight management.

Stress Management

A 10-day program with calming therapies to restore mental peace and clarity.

What Happens During Treatment Programs?

Our treatment modalities include:

External Therapies

Soothing therapeutic procedures applied to the body to nourish and detoxify.
Internal Medications

Pure, potent herbal formulations to correct internal imbalances.
Dietary Guidance

Personalized nutrition plans based on your unique body constitution.
Purification (Panchakarma)

The five core Ayurvedic processes for deep cellular detoxification.
Lifestyle Counseling

Guidance on daily routines, yoga, meditation, and stress management.
External Therapies

These are therapeutic procedures applied externally to soothe, nourish, and detoxify the body. They form the foundation of many of our treatment plans.

Examples Include:
  • Abhyanga: Rhythmic, warm herbal oil massage.
  • Shirodhara: Continuous stream of warm oil on the forehead.
  • Pizhichil: A continuous stream of warm medicated oil drizzled over the whole body.
  • Lepam: Application of herbal pastes to specific body parts.
  • Swedana: Therapeutic herbal steam treatments.
Internal Medications

We use classical Ayurvedic formulations prepared from pure, ethically-sourced herbs to correct internal imbalances and support the body's healing process.

Examples Include:
  • Kashayam: Concentrated herbal decoctions.
  • Choornam: Fine herbal powders.
  • Lehyam: Herbal jams or electuaries.
  • Guggulu: Herbal resin-based tablets.
  • Tailam: Medicated oils for internal consumption.
Dietary Guidance (Ahara)

In Ayurveda, food is considered medicine. Our dietary guidance is not about restriction, but about understanding which foods will nourish your specific body constitution (Prakriti) and help correct your current imbalances (Vikriti).

Personalized Recommendations Include:
  • Food Compatibility: Guidance on which foods, spices, and herbs are best for you.
  • Meal Timing: Advice on when to eat to optimize digestion and energy.
  • Six Tastes (Shad Rasa): How to incorporate all six tastes (sweet, sour, salty, pungent, bitter, astringent) for balanced meals.
  • Mindful Eating: Practices to improve your relationship with food and enhance nutrient absorption.
Purification Therapies (Panchakarma)

Panchakarma is the ultimate mind-body healing experience for detoxifying the body, strengthening the immune system, and restoring balance. It involves five core therapies.

The Five Karmas:
  • Vamana: Therapeutic vomiting or emesis.
  • Virechana: Medicated purgation.
  • Basti: Medicated enema therapy.
  • Nasya: Nasal administration of medicine.
  • Raktamokshana: Procedure to cleanse the blood.
Lifestyle Counseling

Ayurveda emphasizes that a balanced lifestyle is the foundation of health. We provide personalized guidance to help you integrate healthy habits into your daily life.

Guidance Includes:
  • Dinacharya: Ideal daily routines.
  • Ritucharya: Seasonal regimens.
  • Yoga & Meditation: Practices for mind-body harmony.
  • Stress Management: Techniques to build resilience and peace.

Your trusted partner in holistic health and wellness, providing authentic Ayurvedic treatments in Calicut.

Rejuvenation Package (7 Days)

This package is designed to reverse the negative effects of stress and environmental factors. Through nourishing therapies, we aim to restore your body's natural vitality, improve Ojas (life essence), and promote a youthful glow.

Key Benefits:
  • Enhances energy and reduces fatigue.
  • Boosts immune system and resilience.
  • Improves skin texture and complexion.
  • Promotes deep, restful sleep.
Book This Package
Detox & Weight Loss (14 Days)

Our comprehensive detox program focuses on eliminating deep-seated toxins (ama) from the body and resetting your metabolism. This scientific approach helps in sustainable weight management without compromising on health.

Key Benefits:
  • Improves digestion and metabolic rate.
  • Aids in healthy and sustainable weight loss.
  • Enhances mental clarity and focus.
  • Purifies the blood and lymphatic system.
Book This Package
Stress Management (10 Days)

In today's fast-paced world, managing stress is key to overall health. This package combines deeply relaxing therapies like Shirodhara, Abhyanga, and meditation to calm the nervous system and restore your inner equilibrium.

Key Benefits:
  • Significantly reduces stress and anxiety.
  • Combats insomnia and improves sleep quality.
  • Alleviates tension headaches and migraines.
  • Promotes emotional balance and well-being.
Book This Package
